name: Dice shot (Rangeon, LucasDev87)
description:
What is Dice Shot?

Dice shot is a run-and-gun game made in 2 days where you have to roll the dice to see how many times you can shoot.

How do you complete a level?

Go to the next level by clearing all the enemys. If you get lucky, some enemies might drop another roll with the dice.

Is it impossible if you get one or two shots?

No the less shots you got when you rolled the dice: the more powerfull the shot gets! For example: If you got 1-2 shots it will do 5 times as much peircing and bouncing on the edges as if you got 6 shots. 

Controls:

Move: A and D.

Jump: Spacebar.

Aim: Mouse cursor.

Shoot: Left mouse button.

Restart level: R

Developers:

Lucasdev87: Coder, programmer, developer. lucasdev87.itch.io

Rangeon: Pixel art,  sound fx, music, developer.  rangeon.itch.io

Made for GMTK game jam 2022

Dice shot was made for the GMTK  game jam in two days following the theme of "Roll of the dice".

May the dice be with you!

Hope you enjoyed Dice Shot! Please rate it and give some feedback to us!
